reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress well-made with good fabric quality and appreciate its bright green color and lovely weight. The style receives positive feedback, with one customer noting it gives "all the Fall vibes." The fit and sleeve shape receive mixed reviews - while some find it true to size, others say it's pretty short, and one customer mentions the sleeves are a little weird. The flattering aspect also gets mixed reactions. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute but different than the model version
items.body: This dress runs TTS and is a great work-dress length for petites, a few inches above the knee. The corduroy is the weight I expected and I believe will hold up well. I'll likely have it dry cleaned though to preserve the sizing and bc I don't iron. LOL Things to keep in mind: no pockets so no extra fabric at the hips; sleeves are a wee bit long but not past my wrists and they are straight, not flared, and easy to push up if I want; dress is a very slight a-line but cut much more straight silhouette than shown on the model. If you are looking for a flared dress (a la Anthro), this is not a dupe and the model picture is misleading. But it's giving me all the Fall vibes, and I look forward to wearing it with black tights and boots. Read more
items.author: JDub

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brown corduroy a-line dress perfect for Autumn 2025
items.body: Love this super comfy corduroy dress in brown so much. It’s made of an unlined thin wale, not wide wale, corduroy and runs true to the accompanying size guide. Also, the collar did need adjusting so the serged edge doesn’t pop out. (The long necklace I wore held it down so it wasn’t an issue. A piece of fashion tape would also work if you run into the same issue.) Great color and fabric for Autumn 2025, cute style and excellent value imo! Read more
items.author: Marylander

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made
items.body: This dress is fantastic! Great quality. I did have to have it altered because it was too big on the back area and I wanted it more fitted but that was a personal preference. Length and quality of fabric is high end. Very well made. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this dress so much
items.body: ALL the stars for this dress. I've worn this to work and church several times. I feel *so chic* whenever I wear it. That's not a common feeling for me! It's a lovely weight, structured, and so soft. I got the brown and think it's a great, rich brown. As for fit - it was true to size for me. I still expect clothes from amazon to be 1-2 sizes too small, so I first ordered a size up (xxl) but had to return for my normal size (xl). I carry my weight in my middle and as I said, this fit true to size for me. I can see how if you have an hourglass shape, sizing down may work for you. Read more
items.author: Katie McKenzie

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Previously worn upon arrival
items.body: Product arrived used, inside out in the bag and with make up on the garnet. Read more
items.author: Martin L. Wood

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: Really cute dress. I normally order small but for some reason I thought medium (because corduroy doesn’t stretch) might be better. It’s a little snug even though it’s a medium. Read more
items.author: C. S. Carr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality
items.body: Quality material, fitting is great Read more
items.author: Nadine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality!
items.body: Adorable dress for fall! Very comfortable and a perfect fit. Received lots of compliments! Read more
items.author: Heather Fleming

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, Pink, Beige, Blue, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
